Desc.entry: A residential college for adults which provides opportunities to develop skills and gain knowledge for work in communities. Open to people who are aged over 19 years and who lack formal educational qualifications. Courses vary in duration from 2 days to a year. Groups can plan courses with the College around their particular needs and interests. Courses are free as the College is supported by Sheffield City Council and the Learning and Skills Council. The College is open for residential courses during the week and weekends and is available for conferences, seminars and wedding receptions. Adult Learners Week events take place in May.
